description: Modern software development exhibits a curious trend: Yesterday’s Best Practice Becomes Tomorrow’s Antipattern. Why? Haven’t we learned enough about software development to avoid this trap over and over? This keynote investigates why this trend continues, and offers some advice for escaping this vicious cycle.

title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Neal Ford - Why does Yesterday's Best Practice Become Tomorrow's Antipattern?
